Object.Field:
Author: Oracle Version: 10.1.3 Last Update JUN-2007 Register subscribers was updated
Last Update: DEC-2006
- Using jython code : create view and trigger with MSSQL 2K5 Bug driver Inet :"Create View ..." and "Create Procedure ..." executed as PreparedStatement now works with SQL Server 2005. Replace Prepare statement by Create Statement
Last Update: DEC-2004
- Updated the "Create Data View" step to work on MSSQL 2K5 (had to use ordered outer join notation as opposed to the *= notation)
Description: - Journalizing Knowledge Module - This JKM provides simple journalizing procedures on Microsoft SQLServer tables - The following objects are created: - Subscribers central table - Journal table - Triggers on the journalized table that tracks the data changes in the Journal table - Views for selecting data
Restrictions: - This Knowledge Module creates triggers on your source tables. Be sure to validate the scalability of your applications before releasing your developments in your production systems.

create table <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> /* This table is created in the work physical schema of the current Data server */ ( JRN_SUBSCRIBER <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "50")%> not null, JRN_CONSUMED <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1")%> null, JRN_FLAG <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1")%> null, JRN_DATE <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE")%> null, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_WRI_DT] null", ",\n\t", "", "(PK)")%> )

from java.util import Date as date import time, os import java.sql as sql import java.lang as lang
import java.io as jio
class JMMMsSql:
def __init__(self,con): self.repodriver = con[0] self.repourl = con[1] self.repouser = con[2] self.repopass = con[3] self.repoworkschema= con[4] if self.repoworkschema=='' : repoworkschema=None self.repodataschema = con[5] if self.repodataschema=='' : repodataschema=None lang.Class.forName(self.repodriver) self.repoCx = sql.DriverManager.getConnection(self.repourl, self.repouser, self.repopass) self.repoCx.setCatalog(self.repoworkschema) self.stmt = self.repoCx.createStatement() # Use Target Work Database
# Create JV$ view self.requete = """ create view <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_WORK_SCHEMA")%>.<%=snpRef.getInfo( "JRN_VIEW")%> as select case when (<%=snpRef.getColList("", "convert(varchar,TARG.[COL_NAME])", " + ", "", "PK")%>) is null then 'D' else 'I' end <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_FLAG, JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN.JRN_DATE <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_DATE, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME]\t\t" + snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "PK")%>, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "TARG.[COL_NAME]\t\t" + snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "NOT PK")%> from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN left outer join <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TARG on ( <%=snpRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME]\t= TARG.[COL_NAME]", "\nand\t", "", "PK")%> ) where JRN.JRN_DATE = ( select max(L.JRN_DATE) from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> L where L.JRN_CONSUMED = '1' and L.JRN_SUBSCRIBER = JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER and <%=snpRef.getColList("", "L.[COL_NAME]\t= JRN.[COL_NAME]", "\n\t\t\t\tand\t", "", "PK")%> ) """ self.__ExecSql(self.requete)
# Create data view
self.requete = """ create view <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_WORK_SCHEMA")%>.<%=snpRef.getInfo( "JRN_DATA_VIEW")%> as select case when (<%=snpRef.getColList("", "convert(varchar,TARG.[COL_NAME])", " + ", "", "PK")%>) is null then 'D' else 'I' end <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_FLAG, JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN.JRN_DATE <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_DATE, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME]\t\t" + snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "PK")%>, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "TARG.[COL_NAME]\t\t" + snpRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "NOT PK")%> from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN left outer join <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TARG on ( <%=snpRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME]\t= TARG.[COL_NAME]", "\nand\t", "", "PK")%> ) where JRN.JRN_DATE = ( select max(L.JRN_DATE) from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%= snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> L where L.JRN_SUBSCRIBER = JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER and <%=snpRef.getColList("", "L.[COL_NAME]\t= JRN.[COL_NAME]", "\n\t\t\t\tand\t", "", "PK")%> ) """
self.__ExecSql(self.requete)
# Use Target Work Database self.repoCx.setCatalog(self.repodataschema)
# Create trigger UI self.requete = """ create trigger <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_WORK_SCHEMA")%>.<%=snpRef.getInfo( "JRN_UTRIGGER")%> on <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> for insert , update as insert into <%=snpRef.getTable("L", "JRN_NAME", "A")%> ( JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN_CONSUMED, JRN_FLAG, JRN_DATE, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t", "", "PK")%> ) select sbs.JRN_SUBSCRIBER, '0', 'I', getdate(), <%=snpRef.getColList("", "ins.[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t", "", "PK")%> from <%=snpRef.getTable("L", "SUBSCRIBER_TABLE", "A")%> sbs, inserted ins where sbs.JRN_TNAME= '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' """
self.__ExecSql(self.requete)
# Create trigger D
self.requete = """ create trigger <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_WORK_SCHEMA")%>.<%=snpRef.getInfo( "JRN_DTRIGGER")%> on <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> for delete as insert into <%=snpRef.getTable("L", "JRN_NAME", "A")%> ( JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN_CONSUMED, JRN_FLAG, JRN_DATE, <%=snpRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t", "", "PK")%> ) select sbs.JRN_SUBSCRIBER, '0', 'D', getdate(), <%=snpRef.getColList("", "del.[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t", "", "PK")%> from <%=snpRef.getTable("L", "SUBSCRIBER_TABLE", "A")%> sbs, deleted del where sbs.JRN_TNAME= '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' """ self.__ExecSql(self.requete)
self.repoCx.close()
def __ExecSql(self,sql): self.stmt.execute(sql) con = [ '<%=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_JAVA_DRIVER")%>' , '<%=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_JAVA_URL")%>' , '<%=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_USER_NAME")%>' , '<%=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_PASS")%>', '<%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_WORK_CATALOG")%>', '<%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_CATALOG")%>' ] JKM_MsSql=JMMMsSql(con)

delCmd = """ delete from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> where JRN_SUBSCRIBER = ? """
# Prepare the delete prepDelStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(delCmd)
# Execute it for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepDelStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepDelStmt.executeUpdate()
prepDelStmt.close()
# Commit updates myCon.commit()

delCmd = """ delete from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUBS where SUBS.JRN_SUBSCRIBER = ? and SUBS.JRN_TNAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' """
# Prepare the delete prepDelStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(delCmd)
# Execute it for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepDelStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepDelStmt.executeUpdate()
prepDelStmt.close()
# Commit the updates myCon.commit()

insCmd = """ insert into <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> ( JRN_TNAME, JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN_REFDATE, JRN_ROW_COUNT, JRN_DATA_CMD, JRN_COUNT_CMD ) values ( /* JRN_TNAME */ '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>', /* JRN_SUBSCRIBER */ ?, /* JRN_REFDATE */ getdate(), /* JRN_ROW_COUNT */ 0, /* JRN_DATA_CMD */ null, /* JRN_COUNT_CMD */ 'update SUBS set SUBS.JRN_ROW_COUNT=(select count(''X'') from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN where JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER=''$$SUBSCRIBER_NAME$$'') from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUBS where SUBS.JRN_SUBSCRIBER=''$$SUBSCRIBER_NAME$$'' and SUBS.JRN_TNAME = ''<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>''' ) """
selCmd = """ select count('X') from <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> <%=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUBS where SUBS.JRN_SUBSCRIBER = ? and SUBS.JRN_TNAME = '<%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' """
# Prepare the statements prepInsStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(insCmd) prepSelStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(selCmd)
# Execute for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepSelStmt.setString(1, sbs) rs = prepSelStmt.executeQuery() rs.next() nbSubs = rs.getInt(1) if (nbSubs == 0): prepInsStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepInsStmt.executeUpdate()
prepInsStmt.close() prepSelStmt.close()
# Commit the updates myCon.commit()

import java.sql as sql import java.lang as lang
# Connect to the Source Database ie the one that hosts the journalized tables myCon = snpRef.getJDBCConnection("SRC")
# Create the list of Subscribers for a CDC Set lstSbs = [] <%= snpRef.getSubscriberList("" , "lstSbs.append('[SUBSCRIBER]')", "\n", "") %>
Alter subscribers table for V3 comp

alter table <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> add JRN_ROW_COUNT <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> null, JRN_DATA_CMD <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null, JRN_COUNT_CMD <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null

create table <%=snpRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> ( JRN_TNAME <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "35")%> not null, JRN_SUBSCRIBER <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "50")%> not null, JRN_REFDATE <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE")%> null, JRN_ROW_COUNT <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> null, JRN_DATA_CMD <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null, JRN_COUNT_CMD <%=snpRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null, constraint PK_SNP_JRN_SBS primary key (JRN_TNAME, JRN_SUBSCRIBER) )
